# [Interview #1172: Out of Excuses 2016, Entry #1](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1172#1)

#### Ted Herman

Why were the trees at the palace in Azir bronze? Soulcast?

#### Brandon Sanderson

Soulcast for decoration.
